text: Robert Marian Moldoveanu (born 8 March 1999) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a striker for Dinamo București. He was raised by Dinamo București and promoted to the first team by Flavius Stoican. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:SR Brașov players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players
title: Robert Moldoveanu
